abilities: Boss Damage +10% / Crit Rate +20% / Damage to Abnormal Status +8%

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Magician' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Magician and talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'The 3 Arcane Paths'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Wizard (Ice, Lightning) and you will be on the path to a Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning). Wizard (Ice, Lightning) is the 2nd job of Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning)

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Teleport Mastery - Range
  • Chain Lightning - Reinforce, Spread and Extra Strike
  • Frozen Orb - Reinforce

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to splashos49, bel, and the members of the Explorer Mage Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Freezing Crush
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, you unlock the passive Freezing Crush which causes your Ice-attributed attacks to apply a stacking debuff that increases the %Crit Damage and %Damage of your Lighting-attribute attacks. Lightning-attribute attacks will consume a stack of the debuff

In 3rd Job, you unlock the passive called Shatter that causes your attacks to gain increased %Ignore DEF per Freezing Crush stack

Below is a list of your Ice-attribute skills:

  • Cold Beam (2nd Job)
  • Chilling Step (2nd Job)
  • Ice Strike (3rd Job)
  • Frost Ward (3rd Job)
  • Blizzard (4th Job)
  • Frozen Orb (4th Job)
  • Elquines (4th Job)
  • Absolute Zero Aura (Hyper Skill)
  • Ice Age (5th Job)
  • Spirit of Snow (5th Job)

Below is a list of your Lightning-attribute skills:

  • Thunder Bolt (2nd Job)
  • Thunder Sphere - Does not consume (3rd Job)
  • Chain Lightning (4th Job)
  • Lightning Orb (Hyper Skill)
  • Bolt Barrage (5th Job)
  • Jupiter Thunder (5th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'An Arrangement from the Goddess'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 78%, Number of Attacks: 4 Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: Excludes attacks that deal %Max HP damage
Will not work if you have 0 MP

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 190, and up and down with 295
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Mana Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\nHold the Jump key after using to spend 20 MP to descent slowly for up to 5 sec.
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air

After using Mana Wave, holding the Jump Key will allow you to slowly float down
  • You can move while floating

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +90

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Cold Beam
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 199%, Number of Attacks: 3, Freeze Duration: 8
primary.desc: Casts an erupting ice shard forward
details: Enemies that are hit will freeze and be slowed down
Deals increased damage to Fire type monsters

primary.name: Freezing Crush
primary.shortDesc: Grants Critical Damage: +2% per stack when attacking a Frozen enemy. Lightning-based skills consume ice stacks, granting Damage: +9% per stack.
primary.desc: Attacking enemies with Ice-Attribute attacks will provide a stacking debuff
details: [Debuff]: For each stack, receives increased %Crit Damage and additional %Damage for Lightning-Attribute attacks
Using Lightning-Attribute attacks will consume a stack

primary.name: Thunder Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Lightning bolts strike down on nearby enemies

primary.name: Chilling Step
primary.shortDesc: Upon using the Teleport skill, freezes the ground at 60% chance, dealing 2% to enemies on the frozen ground with freeze stacks. Last 6 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, using will have a chance to freeze the ground
details: Frozen ground will slow enemies and apply stacks of
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Meditation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Party Member Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Agile Magic
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +20

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed: 5% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Ice Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Damage: 335% Number of Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Freeze Duration: 8 sec
primary.desc: Icicles strike down from above damaging and freezing nearby enemies

primary.name: Elemental Adaptation (Ice, Lightning)
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 190, upon blocking a debilitating status condition, activates a barrier that blocks additional debilitating status conditions for 30 sec and initiates a 240 sec. Cooldown.\n[Passive Effect: Status and Elemental Resistances +20%]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Critical Abnormal Status effect
details: Upon blocking an Abnormal Status, gain a barrier that blocks an additional Critical Abnormal Status and the skill will go on cooldown
[Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Frost Ward
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 255%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Casts a blast of ice forward that freezes and slows enemies hit
details: Deals increased damage to Fire type monsters

primary.name: Thunder Sphere
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 55, Lightning Orb Summon Duration: 120 sec., Damage: 370%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Using the skill again with the down arrow key fixes the orb in place for 60 sec. Fixed Orb Damage: 370%, Max enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Damage Against Normal Enemies: +170%p
Fixed Orb Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Summons an orb that strikes nearby enemies and follows you around
details:
While active, pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will fix the orb's position and attack in a wider range
  • Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the ability to fix the position by pressing the Skill Key without the Down Arrow Key
Deals increased %p Damage to regular monsters
Does not consume freezing stacks

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Additional MP Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Damage: 340%, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: While toggled, using will damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance
Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Teleport Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Distance: Horizontal +65, Vertical +25.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of
details: Cannot be used at the same time as

primary.name: Shatter
primary.shortDesc: Attack frozen enemies with a 100% chance to ignore 2% DEF for each stack

primary.name: Elemental Decrease
primary.shortDesc: Elemental Attribute Resistance: -10%, Final damage: +40%

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +13%

primary.name: Storm Magic
primary.shortDesc: Deals 20% extra final damage against enemies with the following effects: Damage Over Time, Freeze, Stun, Darkness, or Paralysis

primary.name: Element Amplifcation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: +50%, Damage: +50%

primary.name: Chain Lightning
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 44, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 4 sec, Additional Critical Rate: 25%
primary.desc: Casts a lightning that bounces to nearby enemies
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Freezing Breath
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 22, makes you invincible. Stun up to 8 enemies and inflicts 80% damage 4 times for 13 sec. Reduces enemy Magic DEF by -30% and Weapon DEF by -15%.
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Freezing Breath.
Only inflicts damage to stunned enemies.
This effect lasts as long as the key is held, up to 13 sec. Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: Binds enemies hit by the breath while also reducing their %DEF
details: You are invincible while casting but you cannot move
Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Blizzard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 301%, Number of Attacks: 12, Cooldown: 45 sec\n[Passive Effect: [Final Attack] Your attack skills have a 60% chance to strike a single enemy with a Blizzard, dealing 220% damage.]
primary.desc: Creates a shower of icicles
details: [Final Attack]: Your attacks have a chance to create an icicle that strikes a single enemy

primary.name: Frozen Orb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, create a Frozen Orb that deals 220% damage with ice shards to up to 8 enemies\nCooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Casts a frozen orb that travels forward that damages enemies in its path
details: The orb slows down when it encounters an enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Duration: 40 sec. Periodically restores your base HP and MP by 10%.
Increases Final Damage by 70% during the buff. Periodically increases Final Damage by 3%, can increased up to 115%, Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Mana swirls around the character when 30% remains of the final buff duration (accounting for the duration-enhancing effects).
Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage (additively) and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
When the buff is close to expiring, a visual effect will appear around your character
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Elquines
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Summon Elquines Duration: 260 sec.\nDamage: 127%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 3.\nPermanently increases Mastery by 70%
primary.desc: Summons an ice golem that attacks nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Increases %Weapon Mastery
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increased Magic ATT: +30, Buff Duration: +50%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Successful attacks have a 100% chance to increase your damage by 8% for 5 sec (excludes minion damage).\nThis effect stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Successfully damaging an enemy grants a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Frost Clutch
primary.shortDesc: Grants Critical Damage: +3% per stack when attacking a Frozen enemy. Lightning-based skills consume ice stacks, granting Damage +12% per stack.
details: Increases %Crit Damage and %Damage provided per stack

hyperPassive.name: Teleport Mastery - Range
details: While toggled, increases teleport distance

hyperActive.name: Absolute Zero Aura
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60 per second. Grants Status Resistance: +20, Elemental Resistance: +20% and Damage Taken: -20% to you and nearby party members.
Freezes up to 15 enemies periodically.
Vortex: Duration: 30 sec. Allies within the vortex receive the effects of Absolute Zero Aura for the vortex's duration, even if they weren't nearby when Absolute Zero Aura was first case, or if Absolute Zero Aura has since been toggled Off. Enemies within the vortex freeze more quickly.
Vortex Cooldown: 60 sec.
hyperActive.desc: While toggled, increases Status Resistance and %Damage Reduction
details:
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will create a party zone that applies the active effect
  • Enemies within the zone will gain stacks of

hyperActive.name: Lightning Orb
hyperActive.shortDesc: This is a continuous channeled skill. MP Cost per atttack: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 15. Hold the key down for up to 3.6 sec, Final attack deals up to 780% damage 15 times.\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a large zone that continously damages enemies within it
details: At the end of the skill, deals a final attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Ice Age
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10, Damage: 1100%. Freezes enemies in range.\nArea stays icy for 15 sec, periodically inflicting 275% damage 3 time(s). Damage and freezing effects stack on enemies in range.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a massive icy explosion that covers the map in ice
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
The lingering ice field while periodically damaging and grant stacks of

fifthMain.name: Bolt Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
Conjure 8 lightning bolts that attack up to 12 enemies, dealing 860% damage 15 times.
The lightning moves forward as it strikes, but will continue to strike the same place if its path is blocked. While the lightning is in motion, the skill can be used again to lock it to that location.
Final Damage of lightning bolt decreases by 20% every time the enemy is attacked repeatedly.
Cooldown: 40 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a wall of lightning that pulses forward
details: Strikes the same location if the path is blocked or if the Skill Key is pressed again
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Spirit of Snow
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, stacks Freeze, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 9, Damage: 1870%, Attack Duration: 30 sec\nWhen attacking 1 enemy, Freeze Stacks: 3\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a spirit of snow to attack nearby enemies and applies stacks of
details: When attacking a single enemy, applies 3 stacks instead
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Jupiter Thunder
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Enemy touched by orb is stunned 8 times with 660% damage at fixed intervals. Max Number of Shocks: 30, reduces Freeze stacks for every 5 stuns.
Shocked enemies receive 12% increased Final Damage from lightning attribute attacks except Jupiter Thunder.
Electric current flows around shocked enemy, attacking 2 enemies 4 times with 440% damage periodically.
Cooldown: 120 sec, cooldown reduced by 3.4 sec for every number of shocks that didn't activate.
fifthMain.desc: Fires a lightning orb that expands when it collides with a target and continuously damages nearby enemies
details: The orb will continue to travel again if the current target is defeated
The orb has a fixed number of shocks it can deal before it disappears
Reduces stacks each time an enemy is shocked 5 times by the orb
Enemies hit by the attack receive increased %Final Damage from Lightning-attribute attacks except Jupiter Thunder
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Cooldown is reduced based on how many shocks remain

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Chain Lightning
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 57, Max Monsters Hit: 7, Damage: 335%, Number of Attacks: 10, Stun Chance: 100%, Stun Duration: 5 sec, Critical Rate: +30%
When the attack hits the enemy: 35% chance to create current zone at the location of the enemy within range.
100% chance to create current zone every 7 sec.
Current Zone - Duration: 4 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 140%, Number of Attacks: 2
Max Number of Attacks: 4 per current zone, vanishes when reaching max number of attacks
Max Current Zones: 4 created within map
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Frozen Orb
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Frozen Orb Damage: 428%\nMax Hits per Enemy: 20\nCooldown: 5 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Blizzard
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 328, Damage: 630%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 15
Cooldown: 45 sec
Passive Effect
[Final Attack]: Your direct attacking skills have a 70% chance to strike a single enemy with Blizzard, dealing 400% damage.
Lightning Orb Damage Over Time: +26%p, Finishing Attack Damage: +133%p
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Frozen Lightning
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
Ice and lightning fusion magic, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 815%, Number of Attacks: 7, Shockwaves: 32. Afterwards, Damage: 818%, Number of Attacks: 12, Shockwaves: 24
Creates a frozen land where lightning flows for 30 sec.
The magic power of the ice and lightning within the frozen land that spread in the enemy's body bloom every 2 sec to deal additional damage to the enemy.
Magic Power Bloom - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1680%, Number of Attacks: 15
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning) is an INT mage class part of the Explorers. Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning) utilize both Staves and Wands as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning) can equip Magic Books and Shields
